overview.title: Why Choose E-Signature & Mobile Signature?
overview.description: E-Signature and Mobile Signature solutions establish a secure digital approval mechanism for businesses. ESM E-Signature & Mobile Signature allows all internal and external authorization, approval and contract processes to be completed electronically. Users can sign documents instantly from their computers or mobile devices, ensuring operational speed and legal security in every transaction.

benefits: Provides legally valid and secure electronic signing
Digitalizes identity verification and approval processes
Reduces time, paper and operational costs
Fully compliant with national digital signature regulations and ECA (Electronic Certificate Authority) standards
Enables instant signing through mobile devices anytime and anywhere

features.title: Electronic Signature Infrastructure

features.title: Compliance and Security
